DOC.detailed_description: The treatment plan two-step design . Day 1 pt receive Gemcitabine IV Day 2 pt receive Oxaliplatin IV . This treatment cycle repeat approximately every 28 day . Subsequent treatment cycle dosage base toxicity diary lab work result . CT scan repeat every 2 treatment cycle . Continuation study dependent upon tumor response .
